channel.title: Where can I get this theme?
channel.description:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?theme=5
Please, dont tell me "simplemachines.org", because yes, I have looked there. I saw it on the simplemachines forum at one point, but I cannot find the topic again. I have looked at the theme section, and still cannot find it. The only thing I know about it, is that it is built for the smartphone.
Why did I resort to asking? I didnt use SMF-RC3 at the time of me seeing it, so I thought nothing of it.

item.title: Where can I get this theme?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:15, topic:341506”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=437907.msg3218595#msg3218595 date=1274963201]
No, it’s because talking lke diz n lik dat isn’t cool anymore.
[/quote]
It was cool at some point? I never knew! :eek:[/quote]F U you know what I mean lol.

Read full topic
